snippet.title: Nioh 2 4K Gameplay - Full Demo Walkthrough and Mezuki Boss Battle
snippet.description:
Nioh 2 is coming to PS4 in early 2020 and this is the latest 4K gameplay from the demo shown at Tokyo Game Show. Includes a look at the new custom character, yokai powers and attacks, new weapons, enemies, and a big boss fight with a demonic horse called Mezuki.

PlayStation Access brings you the latest PS4 news, features and gameplay every week, giving you unprecedented access to the biggest titles on PlayStation. Subscribe now to ensure you never miss out: http://bit.ly/AccessSub

All music featured courtesy of epidemicsound.com (http://www.epidemicsound.com)

We use AverMedia's live Gamer Pro for PS4 capture and streaming. 

Want more?
